desc: Thumbs Pets® is a creative online boutique for cats and dogs, and for loving pet parents. We offer one of a kind artistic home decor such as cat and dog pillows, disposable cat litter mat, cat screens, cat and dog gifts, pet beds, pet feeders, pet bowls, artistic accessories for pet parents with refined taste.

layout.text: Luxury Online Cat and Dog Lovers Boutique- designer pet-themed home decor, cat and dog products.
